show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #35 Greg Gunthorp "Food Security is National Security"
subtitle: #35 Greg Gunthorp "Food Security is National Security"
summary:
Greg Gunthorp from Gunthorp Farms in Indiana joins us today to talk about raising niche pork on pasture, meat packer concentration, the velocity of money and what we might be able to do as producers and consumers to change the status quo.
